Isha Sathsang
November, 2016
 

Though among the five elements, fire accounts for the smallest proportion in the composition of the human body, its influence is tremendous.

- Sadhguru

Monthly Group Meditation (Sathsang)
 
Isha Monthly Group Meditation is an opportunity to reconnect with your kriya with Sadhguru's voice guiding you through the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya. Here are the details of our upcoming Sathsang:

Date & Time: 12 November, 9:00 AM to 11:15 AM
Venue: Viva Dance, 9th Floor, Dawning House, 145 Connaught Road Central, Sheung Wan ( Map)

Inner engineering online participants
Please be outside the door not later than 35 minutes of start time to join the session after the Shambhavi practice.

* Please note that Sathsang will be conducted on the 2nd Saturday of every month across all Asia Pacific centers including Hong Kong starting from Jan 2017.
